content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 20, "index": 13}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 59, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft flower_banner_pattern, I need to craft paper, which requires placing 3 sugar_cane in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move one of the sugar_cane from slot 30 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "sugar", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 20, "index": 13}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 59, "index": 35}]
thought: I have moved one sugar_cane into the crafting grid, but I still need two more. Therefore I will move another sugar_cane from slot 30 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 20, "index": 13}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 59, "index": 35}]
thought: I have moved two sugar_cane into the crafting grid, but I still need one more. Therefore I will move another sugar_cane from slot 30 to slot 3.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 20, "index": 13}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 59, "index": 35}]
thought: I have crafted the paper, but it is in the crafting slot. Therefore I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 20, "index": 13}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 59, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the paper, I need to move it into the crafting grid. Therefore I will move it from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 20, "index": 13}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 59, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that I have moved the paper into the crafting grid, I need to move the oxeye_daisy next to it. Therefore I will move it from slot 19 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: flower_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 12}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 20, "index": 13}, {"type": "dispenser", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 59, "index": 35}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the flower_banner_pattern, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 14).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 14 with quantity 1
